ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Newbie Bard needs hunting suggestions
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh!  ye folks would go nuts playin on my system then ;o)~   233 AMD w/64 Megs of RAM (soon to be upped), and a crappy-arsed rural connection that gets me 24k
ygData.messageBody:
Heh! ye folks would go nuts playin on my system then ;o)~ 233 AMD w/64
Megs of RAM (soon to be upped), and a crappy-arsed rural connection that
gets me 24k *at the most* (usually connected at 21.6k, and yes I am using a
56k modem ;pp )

-=B=-
Country Boy
----- Original Message -----
From: Elijah Meeker <emeeker@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, July 05, 2000 11:36 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Newbie Bard needs hunting suggestions


>
> > But anyway, that doesn't alter the fact that Blackburrow is
> > laggier than any
> > other low level zone (except perhaps low-level RoK zones) and
> > still seems an
> > odd choice for a bard to hunt in. Tszaaz, do you experience
> > lag ANYWHERE???
>
>
> Before I recently got a new machine I was using a PII 233 with 128 meg and
a
> 28000 modem. The only zones that were unhuntable were Unrest and near the
> Aviak City in SK (and Kunark before I lowered my clipping to about1/3).
128
> makes alll the difference :o)
>
> Tszaaz
>
